story.title: My story
story.p1: I'm a Sr Software Engineer and teacher passionate about technology. I'm currently focused on obtaining my Systems Engineering degree at the National Technological University.
story.p2: I started my career as a full stack developer, working on backend, APIs, web frontend and mobile applications. I even ventured into the world of augmented reality.
story.p3: I currently specialize in frontend development with React and JavaScript. I also teach in the Video Game Production degree, where together with my students we create 2D game prototypes in HTML5.
